projects.title: Paint App
projects.notes: NEW Tree brush! Self-directed project spun off of much simpler LaunchSchool assignment. Features including local save, undo/redo, multiple resizeable brushes. See the readme for a full list. Not for mobile.

projects.title: React 7 Day Forecast App
projects.notes: Self-directed project built with React using the Wunderground.com API. Renders simple seven-day forecast with extended information shown per day on click. Uses rough location from IP by default, users can enter city and state, zip, or choose to give access to their location via the Geoloaction API.

projects.title: Penny Poll
projects.notes: A distributive voting experiment - self-directed project. Users can create polls and assign a number of votes per user. When voting, users can distribute their votes however they wish: all votes in one option, 50/50 or any other way. Results are presented with an attractive 3D pie graph using the Chartkick gem. </br></br> The app, partially an exercise in not using a database (it was done before the PostgreSQL course) skirts Heroku's ephemeral file system by reading/writing its data files to Google Drive using the google_drive gem and a service worker account.

projects.title: A Todo App!
projects.notes: Wouldn't be a portfolio without a todo app - Attractive and functional LaunchSchool project for Sinatra and SQL courses.
